channel.title: reproducibility on The AstroInformatic
channel.description: Recent content in reproducibility on The AstroInformatic

item.title: Using PySpark to call compiled Scala from Python
item.description: Calling compiled Scala code inside the JVM from Python using PySpark

item.title: Mirroring Public Repos on Github, Privately
item.description: How to have an open public repository as well as a mirrored private repository on Github

item.title: Packaging Scala Applications
item.description: Scala compiles down to Java byte code, which can then be run on any system running the JVM. It would be nice if one could extend this to native system binaries that can be run anywhere. Here I walk through the steps of getting SBT-Native-Packager to create a native binary as well as a docker image that can run my ‘Hello World’ application.

item.title: Multilingual Notebooks: A Polyglot's Playground
item.description: Here I walk through the steps of installing the MATLAB, R and Julia kernels for Jupyter notebooks. Also discussed are some of the gotchas I encountered along the way.
